it.softphone.rd.gwt.client.widget.base.social
Class CommentBox<T extends Feed>

java.lang.Object
  it.softphone.rd.gwt.client.widget.base.social.SocialBox
      it.softphone.rd.gwt.client.widget.base.social.CommentBox<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the class
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasVisibility, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.IsWidget, ResourceAware
public class CommentBox<T extends Feed>
extends SocialBox

A box containing a Feed

This class contains a Feed and consists in:
  • The text of the comment
  • The username
  • The insert date
If a comment length is provided, the comment will be truncated and a link will be added to the box. Clicking the link the entire comment will be showed. If no lenght is provided, will be used the default value of 200

Author:
Alessandro Casolla
